[ti:Anyone]

[00:00.00]Anyone - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:01.60]Lyrics by：Andrew Watt/Michael Pollack/Raul Cubina/Justin Bieber/Jordan K. Johnson/Stefan Johnson/Alexander Izquierdo/Jonathan Bellion
[00:03.21]Composed by：Andrew Watt/Michael Pollack/Raul Cubina/Justin Bieber/Jordan K. Johnson/Stefan Johnson/Alexander Izquierdo/Jonathan Bellion
[00:04.82]Dance with me under the diamonds
[00:07.52]
[00:08.89]See me like breath in the cold
[00:11.13]
[00:12.93]Sleep with me here in the silence
[00:15.72]
[00:17.24]Come kiss me silver and gold
[00:19.15]
[00:20.71]You say that I won't lose you
[00:22.38]But you can't predict the future
[00:24.37]So just hold on like you will never let go
[00:27.37]
[00:29.01]Yeah if you ever move on without me
[00:31.98]
[00:33.84]I need to make sure you know
[00:35.61]
[00:37.24]That you are the only one I'll ever love
[00:42.86]I gotta tell ya gotta tell ya
[00:45.32]Yeah you
[00:46.72]
[00:47.31]If it's not you it's not anyone
[00:50.92]I gotta tell ya gotta tell ya
[00:53.57]Looking back on my life
[00:55.35]You're the only good I've ever done
[00:59.19]
